analysis_type: Week 3 Day 5 End-to-End Integration Dependency Resolution
issue_summary: 0% test pass rate due to module import path resolution failures

details: Unity-Claude-IntegratedWorkflow uses relative module names without paths
PowerShell cannot find modules in PSModulePath during import
All 3 dependencies fail: RunspaceManagement, UnityParallelization, ClaudeParallelization
Functions exist and are properly exported but dependencies unavailable

fixes_applied.path_resolution: Added absolute path construction using PSScriptRoot navigation
fixes_applied.dependency_validation: Added Test-ModuleDependencies function with status reporting
fixes_applied.function_level_checks: Added Assert-Dependencies function for runtime validation
fixes_applied.ascii_compliance: Removed unicode characters for PowerShell 5.1 compatibility

technical_changes: Replace relative imports with absolute paths using Join-Path
Navigate from module directory to project Modules folder
expected_resolution: Dependencies should now load successfully enabling 100% test functionality
